div.p: Proposed PL mechanism of NM-CQDs synthesized by pulsed laser ablation (PLA). ( a) The measured PLE spectrum of NM-CQDs determined by monitoring the PL peak at 470 nm (dashed line), the sum of Lorentzian fittings (red line), and two Lorentzian functions (green lines). ( b) PL emission mechanism profile of NM-CQDs.
